sentences.en: Chance of Unicorn's Blinding increased from 30 % to 40 %.
sentences.cn: 独角兽的失明发生机率由30%升为40%.

sentences.en: Harry sees a hooded figure drink the blood of an injured unicorn.
sentences.cn: 哈利看到了蒙面数字喝血的受伤独角兽.

sentences.en: He took off his lily and handed the unicorn.
sentences.cn: 他摘下一朵百合,递给了独角兽.

sentences.en: He's modeling a unicorn in wax.
sentences.cn: 他在用蜡制作独角兽.

sentences.en: I believe unicorn was once living in the world.
sentences.cn: 我相信独角兽曾经生活在这个世界。

sentences.en: It's not easy ter catch a unicorn, they're powerful magic creatures.
sentences.cn: 不会有那么快,'海格说,'抓住一只独角兽是很不容易的, 它们这种动物具有很强的魔法.

sentences.en: Many medieval pictures of the unicorn portray it resting its head, with phallic horn, in the lap of a maiden, an image with not too hidden sexual imagery.
sentences.cn: 独角兽在许多中世纪的图画中，总是低着头，顶着阴茎一般的角，依偎在少女的裙下，呈现出一幅性暗示不那么隐晦的图景。

sentences.en: Opening image: A glorious well-oiled angel riding on a winged unicorn.
sentences.cn: 开场图片：一个辉煌的醉酒天使骑在长翅膀的独角兽上。

sentences.en: Opening image: A glorious well-oiled angel riding on a winged unicorn. Sure, it's sexy. But too sexy?
sentences.cn: 开场图片：一个辉煌的醉酒天使骑在长翅膀的独角兽上。当然，它性感。但是很性感么？

sentences.en: That is because it is a monstrous thing , to slay a unicorn.
sentences.cn: 杀死一只独角兽算得上是滔天罪行.

sentences.en: The captain of the Unicorn was led to the royal palace.
sentences.cn: “独角兽号”船长被引进王宫.

sentences.en: The reason there are so few unicorn sightings today isn't because they are mythical creatures that never existed, but because of modern society's moral depravity.
sentences.cn: 这些年很少有人见到独角兽，这并非因为那都是童话，现实里压根就不存在什么的。 而是现代社会人心不古，道德沦丧。

sentences.en: The unicorn is a lonely , solitary creature that symbolizes hope.
sentences.cn: 每个人的心里都有一只独角兽,只要你相信, 那份纯真就会存在.

sentences.en: The unicorn is an imaginary beast.
sentences.cn: 独角兽是幻想出来的动物.

sentences.en: The unicorn lived in a lilac wood and she lived all alone.
sentences.cn: 一只独角兽独自生活在一片淡紫色的森林里.

sentences.en: This man is very happy, because in his garden with a unicorn.
sentences.cn: 这人非常高兴, 因为在自己的花园里有一只独角兽.

sentences.en: UNICORN Corporation technique . At present UNICORN Corporation's digital programmable DC load for sale has advanced technique.
sentences.cn: 目前,UNICORN株式会社销售的数字式可程式直流电子负载具有先进的技术.

sentences.en: Unicorn looked dreamily at Alice, and said'Talk, child.
sentences.cn: 独角兽神秘地看着爱丽丝, 说: “ 讲话吧, 孩子. ”

sentences.en: Week of Unicorn: Double growth for Unicorns and Battle Unicorns.
sentences.cn: 独角兽周: 独角兽产量加倍.

sentences.en: When the unicorn saw the number stuck to my side, it started bouncing up and down in excitement.
sentences.cn: 当这只独角兽看见贴在我侧面的数字时，它开始兴奋地跳上跳下。

trans.tran_cn: （传说中身体似马的）独角兽，<动>一角鲸，独角兽标记
trans.tran_en: an imaginary animal like a white horse with a long straight horn growing on its head
